resources.string: Shri Bhawani Niketan Institute of Technology and Management (SBNITM) â€“ a premiere Engineering Institute, was established in the year 2009 through the approvals and affiliations of AlCTE , New Delhi and Rajasthan Technical University, Kota. The college is nestled in the 350 acres campus of Shri Bhawani Niketan Shiksha Samiti, situated in the heart of city with close proximity of Bus stand, Railway station, shopping centers hospitals etc. The campus building is inspired by Rajasthan heritage which makes it very beautiful and alluring.

To teach and train students to make them competent engineering professionals and good citizens with strong, moral and ethical values by constantly upgrading technical infrastructure, improving teaching-learning process and having vibrant institute industry interaction.

To develop SBNITM into a centre of excellence for techno managerial education of global standards, having superior professional skill with strong ethical values to meet the engineering needs of the society and the nation.
Address :- Sikar Road, near Maharao Shekha Circle, Jaipur, Rajasthan 302039
Shri Bhawani Niketan Institute Of Technology and Management
